name: Crime Is King
description:
In a world where crime rules, loiter on that patch of grass and show everyone why you're the one who deserves to wear the crown.

This is a local multiplayer game of 2-4 players,  gamepads are required in order to play.

______________________________________________________________

This is an old game I found from the Ubisoft Bluebyte Game Jam I did at the 2016 Next Level Festival in Düsseldorf alongside 3 others. The theme given was Crime.

______________________________________________________________

Controls

Left Thumbstick = Move

B = Attack / Throw

X = Pick up item / Drop item
